articles.title: New Physics Model Challenges the Big Bang Story We Thought We Knew - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists propose that gravitational waves shaped the universe. Their model challenges inflation theory. How exactly did the universe start, and how did these processes determine its formation and evolution? A recent study published in Physical Review Resear…
